com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.gui.scene
Class ChatGUI

java.lang.Object
  com.jme.renderer.pass.Pass
      com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.gui.GUIPass
          com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.gui.scene.ChatGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ChatGUI
extends GUIPass

ChatGUI defines the concrete implementation of the GUI render pass that displays the chat interface during the battle stage of the game.

Version:
Creation date: 11-12-2008 12:18 EST, Modified date: 11-12-2008 14:39 EST
Author:
Yi Wang (Neakor)

appendChatMessage

public void appendChatMessage(String name,
                              String chatMessage)
Append the given chat message to the correct output fields.

Parameters:
name - The name of the player who sent the message
chatMessage - The chat message needs to be appended.

setInputEnabled

public void setInputEnabled(boolean enabled)
Enable or disable the input field.

Parameters:
enabled - True if the input field should be enabled. False disabled.

setStayEnabled

public void setStayEnabled(boolean stayEnabled)
Set if the chat input field should stay enabled.

Parameters:
stayEnabled - True if the chat input field should stay enbled. False otherwise.
